news_header: Content creators in Japan are gaining attention for buying and renovating abandoned homes called akiyas, which are available at low prices, especially outside major cities.
news_text: In Japan, content creators are going viral for purchasing and renovating akiyas, or abandoned homes, which can be bought at significantly lower prices compared to other major cities worldwide. Some akiyas are even being offered for free in remote areas. While this trend appears to be a great opportunity for those struggling to enter the housing market, BBC correspondent Shaimaa Khalil investigates the underlying realities of this phenomenon.
